Header: President receives blessings paying obeisance to historic Kirivehera
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena has received blessings paying obeisance to the historic Kirivehera. President Maithripala Sirisena visited to historic Kataragama Sacred site in view of his birthday and engaged in religious observances. The President also paid obeisance to the Kirivehera. Members of the Maha Sangha including the Ven. Thalagala Gnanendra Thera of Kirivehera showered blessings on the President. The President also participated in an Ashirvadha Pooja conducted at the Kataragama Maha Devale. President Maithripala Sirisena also received blessings visiting the other Devales in the premises. Among those who joined in the occasion was a group including the Basnayake Nilame of the Ruhunu Kataragama Maha Devale Dilruwan Rajapaksa. Meanwhile, an Ashirvada Bodhi Pooja organized by the North Central Governor’s Office in view of the President’s birthday was held near the Jaya Sri Mahabodhi. The Pinkama was organized under the guidance of the Chief Incumbent of the Atamasthana the Ven. Dr. Pallegama Sirinivasa Thera.
